title: We’ve Come a Long Way, Guys! Rhetorics of Resistance to the Feminist Critique of Sexist Language

description: Author Martha Copp discusses the article, “We’ve Come a Long Way, Guys! Rhetorics of Resistance to the Feminist Critique of Sexist Language” published by Gender & Society.
